title: How to Know if Someone Blocked You on TikTok

steps.title: Open TikTok.
steps.content: Open TikTok . It’s the app with a music note inside. You’ll usually find it on the home screen or in the app drawer (if you have an Android). [1] X Research source

steps.title: Tap the profile icon.
steps.content: Tap the profile icon. It’s the outline of a person at the bottom-right corner of the screen. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Tap Following.
steps.content: Tap Following . This displays a list of people you’re following.

steps.title: Look for the user you think has blocked you.
steps.content: Look for the user you think has blocked you. If you were following that user and they’ve blocked you, they will disappear from your Following list.

steps.title: Open TikTok.
steps.content: Open TikTok . It’s the app with a music note inside. You’ll usually find it on the home screen or in the app drawer (if you have an Android). [3] X Research source

steps.title: Tap the notifications icon.
steps.content: Tap the notifications icon. It’s the square speech bubble at the bottom of the screen. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Tap a comment or mention you made on that user’s video.
steps.content: Tap a comment or mention you made on that user’s video. You can also tap any tags of you they added to their posts. If you cannot view the video, there’s a chance you may have been blocked. Try to follow the person to find out for sure.

steps.title: Open TikTok.
steps.content: Open TikTok. It’s the app with a music note inside. You’ll usually find it on the home screen or in the app drawer (if you have an Android).

steps.title: Open the discover page.
steps.content: Open the discover page. This has a globe or magnifying glass icon. [5] X Research source

steps.title: Type the person’s username and tap the Search key.
steps.content: Type the person’s username and tap the Search key. A list of results will appear.

steps.title: Tap the person’s username.
steps.content: Tap the person’s username. If you’re blocked, their account will hide its bio and videos, and you will see "You can't view this person's videos due to their user privacy settings". This may not mean you are blocked, however—some accounts are hidden to everyone except a few people.

steps.title: Tap Follow.
steps.content: Tap Follow . If you are able to follow this person (or able to request to follow), you haven’t been blocked. [6] X Research source If you see a message that says ″You can't follow this account due to their user privacy settings,″ you’ve likely been blocked by this user.
